attributes.background: Abolish Holyrood as it is not fit for purpose and only serves as a tool for militant separatists to divide the people of this great nation.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition calling for the powers of the Scottish Parliament to be transferred to Westminster if that's what you would like to see happen.
